All who would enter the city of God must during their earthly life set forth Christ in their dealings. It is this 
                                                                           16
that constitutes them the messengers of Christ, His witnesses. They are to bear a plain, decided testimony against all evil practices, pointing sinners to the Lamb of God, who taketh away the sin of the world.--Testimonies, vol. 9, p. 23.
